name: Dead of Night (itch) (adri33tomas)
description:
This game is the final projet for our Unity class.

The objective is survive and try to escape, collect all the keys and open all the gates to find the way to get out, but careful with the undead. 

CONTROLS:

Movement: W, A, S, D

Camera: Mouse

Shoot: Left Click or Ctrl

CREDITS:

Martin Casas

Elisa Rojas

Alex Dragomir

Adrián Tomás
